name: V.E.S.T.A.L.E
description:
You are a V.E.S.T.A.L.E. (Visual Emoji Short Text Application Link Expert) an operator of this strange kind of instant messenger application that allow Roman gods to communicate.

When you receive a message you have to relay it to the correct phone as fast as possible. For example: if Jupiter ask you to send a Laugh to Ceres you have to click the laugh icon on the Ceres phone. Easy right?

But there is a catch: all your phones run on batteries, and so you have to keep them charged. Click on the arrow below the phone to connect it to the charger.

Remember: the phones should always be “burning”.
